info.name: Car Wash Backend API 2
info.description: Postman collection for Car Wash Backend API

request.description: Register a new admin user. This typically requires existing admin privileges to execute.
Login as an admin user

header.description: Requires an existing company admin token

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Company Admin User",
  "username": "companyadmin",
  "email": "admin@company.com",
  "password": "securePassword123",
  "accountType": "company",
  "phone_number": "123-456-7890",
  "address": "123 Admin Ave, Anytown",
  "is_admin": true
}

request.description: Register a new company with admin privileges. This typically requires existing company admin privileges to execute.
Login as a company with admin privileges

body.raw:
{
  "product_name": "Car Wax",
  "description": "Premium car wax for a long-lasting shine",
  "price": 19.99,
  "stock": 100,
  "sub_category_ids": [1]
}

request.description: Add a super-admin employee with the highest level of privileges within a company
Add a manager employee with intermediate privileges within a company
Promote a regular user to an admin (requires admin privileges)
Demote an admin user to a regular user (requires admin privileges)
Get all companies pending approval (requires admin privileges)

item.name: Company Admin Operations

request.description: Promote a regular user to a company admin (requires company admin privileges)
Demote a company admin user to a regular user (requires company admin privileges)
Get all companies pending approval (requires company admin privileges)

item.description: Operations that require company admin privileges

header.description: JWT for an authenticated admin user. Obtain this from your login endpoint.

formdata.description: Select an image file for the brand logo. In Postman, click 'Select Files'.
The name of the car brand.

formdata.value: A Japanese multinational conglomerate manufacturer of automobiles, motorcycles, and power equipment.
formdata.description: A brief description of the brand.

request.description: Creates a new car brand, requiring admin authentication and an uploaded logo.

header.description: JWT for an authenticated admin user.

formdata.description: (Optional) Select a new image file if you want to update the logo. In Postman, click 'Select Files'.
(Optional) The updated name of the car brand.
(Optional) An updated description of the brand.

variable.description: Replace with the ID of the brand to update.

request.description: Updates an existing car brand by ID, requiring admin authentication. Uses multipart/form-data if logo is included.

header.description: JWT for an authenticated admin user.

variable.description: Replace with the ID of the brand to delete.

request.description: Deletes a car brand by its ID, requiring admin authentication.

item.name: GET Brands

request.description: Retrieves a list of all car brands.
Retrieves a single car brand by its ID.
Retrieves a car brand along with all cars associated with it.

item.description: Public endpoints for retrieving car brand information.

request.description: Requires valid JWT token of a company user
At least one field must be provided.
